resources.string: Hello, dearie, and welcome to Ebonscale Reach. Constance Redridge, at your service.\n\nI assure you, we are doing everything we can to battle against the Corruption here.
Welcome to Ebonscale Reach, dearie. I'm Constance Redridge.\n\nThe Corrupted threat has finally attracted the attention of the rest of Aeternum, but we've been keenly aware of it for years.

It's my fervent belief that canceling our cultural traditions puts us in the mentality of defeat.\n\nBut we must ensure the Corrupted don't interrupt our performance. They will try if they learn of it.
Thank you for all your help, dearie. Rehearsals of our play are going smoothly once more.\n\nI will let you know once we've scheduled a performance.
If you're the hunting type, you'll find Ebonscale has a variety of wildlife unlike anywhere else on Aeternum.
Ah, I think I've spotted a fellow hunter of beasts, have I not?\n\nThe creatures here in Ebonscale are the most dangerous in all of Aeternum, a fine challenge if you've the gall to accept it.

Well now, you've proven yourself adept at hunting a type of creature you're likely familiar with.\n\nWhat would you say to taking on even more thrilling challenge? What would you say to hunting tigers?
I tip my skinning knife to you, friend. You've got serious skill with besting beasts.\n\nPerhaps someday, when this Corruption business abates, we can go on an expedition together.
You are new to Ebonscale, but I see potential in you already.\n\nThere are always opportunities to improve life here in the settlement.
Ah, it is good to have you here in our fine settlement.\n\nDid you wash ashore in Ebonscale, or have you come from some other part of the island?

Now, to slightly less enjoyable subject - the catastrophic flooding of the southern plains. \n\nMany people seemed to have been killed - we put their corpses in the Skysong Crypt, but in the end, they did not stay dead.
Your services to the settlement and the people in it shall not be soon forgotten.
Greetings, I am Ting Long. I once served the Zhou Dynasty, but I am now proudly independent.
You come here to Ebonscale at the same time as the Corruption surges and envelops the land around us. \n\nHow do I know you aren't an agent of Corruption here to deceive me once again?

I feel partly responsible for the damage the Empress and her Corrupted have wrought.\n\nAfter all, I helped build the shrines she leveraged for power. I cannot repair all the damage, but I would like to try.
Cleansing the Shrine will set the Empress and her forces back, but it will not stop them.\n\nThese plans you recovered indicate that even now, her lieutenants meet to plan an offensive.
For all you've done, you deserve my thanks and more. \n\nFor now, my work is redeemed and my heart is at peace, cleansed like the Dragon Shrine.
Keep lookin' at me like that and I'll make your jaw dance.
Always happy to see a fellow soldier-of-fortune. How can I help you, mate?

Always happy to see a fellow soldier-of-fortune. How can I help you, mate?



[ Level 49 required for Ebonscale Reach faction missions ]
Go on, sling your hook, big brain. I've had my fill of your kind.
Here to offer me salvation? I've got all the salvation I need in this here scabbard.
Well now, it's my honor to finally acknowledge the rising Champion in our ranks.\n\nMany have come forward to vouch for your valor, and now you are ready face the trial to become a Commander.

Well now, it's my honor to finally acknowledge the rising Champion in our ranks.

Many have come forward to vouch for your valor, and now you are ready face the trial to become a Commander.



[ Level 49 required for Ebonscale Reach faction missions ]
I salute you, Commander {playerName}. You are a paragon within our ranks.\n\nBack to the fight, then! Always, to the fight!

I salute you, Commander {playerName}. You are a paragon within our ranks.

Back to the fight, then! Always, to the fight!



[ Level 49 required for Ebonscale Reach faction missions ]
Good day, stranger. Make yourself at home here in Ebonscale Reach. I am Alchemist Lane.
Seek forever farther, my scholar. In what manner may I oblige you?

Seek forever farther, my scholar. In what manner may I oblige you?



[ Level 49 required for Ebonscale Reach faction missions ]
Ignorance is bold, knowledge is reserved. -Thucydides
Many, while doing the foulest deeds, use the fairest words. -Democritus
May the light protect you. Adjudicator Wen at your service.
I welcome you in service to the light. What is your bidding, fellow keeper.

I welcome you in service to the light. What is your bidding, fellow keeper.



[ Level 49 required for Ebonscale Reach faction missions ]
You may not recognize it, Marauder, but the light watches over even you.
I respect your hunger for knowledge, researcher. But the most important is found within, not without.
Welcome to the Ebonscale Bar. I am Bao, and I serve food and drink here.
Hello there! Are you new to Ebonscale Reach? Yes, I think so! \n\nThere are many curiosities here - the flora, the fauna, the very elements themselves - I believe this territory is unique!
Are you ready to get your hands dirty with another task of mine? This one will prove much more dangerous.
You've satisfied my many curiosities about the Reach we now call home and made it a safer place to be.\n\nYou have my eternal gratitude.
You are most welcome to Ebonscale, traveler. \n\nDespite the dangers, I hope you can find some measure of peace and comfort here.
Greetings. It is a pleasure to meet you.\n\nI am Zeng Lingyun, former handmaiden to the Empress Zhou Taiying, before she became Corrupted.
We have the statuettes now, and the key is assembled.\n\nNow, you may challenge the Empress and her Corrupted cohort.
Come, rest your weary feet here at the Dark Night Inn.\n\nYou'll find no better rest in all Aeternum.
I'm Master Fisher Chang and fishing is my game! I'm an expert on the fish in the area.
I'm Master Fisher Chang and fishing is my game! I'm an expert on the fish in the area.
One day I'd like to start up a fishing tournament. Wouldn't that be splendid?
I am here to loose the chains of all who would defy the Empress, for the good of the world.
My fighting prime may be long past, but I will never stop being Guo the Liberator. Wherever there is injustice, I appear.
